title: Matter
summary: Matter is anything that has mass and occupies space. Everything around us is made of matter.
sample_question: What are the three main states of matter?

title: Force
summary: A force is a push or pull acting on an object. It can change an object's motion, speed, or direction.
sample_question: What is the SI unit of force?

title: Energy
summary: Energy is the ability to do work or cause change. It exists in different forms like kinetic, potential, heat, and light.
sample_question: What is the difference between kinetic and potential energy?

title: Gravity
summary: Gravity is the force that attracts objects towards the center of the Earth or any other mass.
sample_question: Why do objects fall toward the ground?
